concept.title: General Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the following general properties for the Directory origin:

row.entry: A directory local to the where source files are stored.
Regular expression that describes the file names. For example, *.log.

entry.p: The maximum number of files allowed in the directory. When the directory contains more files, the pipeline fails.

row.entry:
Name of the first file to process. Use a name that uses the file name pattern.
When you enter a file name, Directory reads the first file and other files in the directory with ascending names.

After processing a file, Directory performs one of the following tasks:
Archive - Moves the file to the archive directory.
Delete - Deletes the file.
The directory for processed files. Available when you select Archive for the File Post Processing property.
Number of seconds to wait for a new file. If a new file does not arrive within the specified time, Directory sends an empty batch to destinations.
The directory for files that were not completely processed due to data handling errors.

Data format for source files. Use one of the following formats:
Log files
JSON files
Delimited files
